title: League of Legends not working
body:
There's a problem with my League of Legends. 
After I click the launch button on my League of Legends, the login screen does not show up.
I'm confused what to do.
Is it because my anti-virus? I'm using Quick Heal Total Security.

replies.body: Do any errors or other dialogues appear at all?

Hi,

Take a look at [this article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) from our support site on patching issues.  I'd specifically look into the following steps:

* Run the game as administrator
* Disable User Account Control
* Temporarily disable your firewall

You could also try a reinstall and see if that helps.

If you still have issues, I'd suggest opening a ticket with the support team, who should be able to help you further.

Cheers
Mindstar

>You could also try a reinstall and see if that helps.

So casual, man.
